issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Each new operation creates new entry in the ConcurrentMap in RoutingAppender but when the operation ends, AppenderControl stored in the map is retrieved and stopped but the entry in ConcurrentMap is never cleaned up.
fields.summary: Memory leak in RoutingAppender for every hive operation

comments.body: Attached patch makes sure that entries in ConcurrentMap are removed when the operation is cleaned-up
Updated new patch which has code changes to verify the new code changes.
